I personally love having this option of a sleepy time supplement because I wear retainers at night. I don’t like to take them out and have to chew a gummy. These are quick, normal sized pills to swallow. The benefits and ingredients are still super effective and there’s no taste to them.

I received these a few weeks ago and have been taking 2 capsules when needed it. I have trouble sleeping most night and I take these 30 mins before bed and I sleep so comfortable. It didn’t give me any side effects. The ingredients are Perfect and always great quality.  I also try and take the dosage that’s required just to be safe. Overall great product.

I fall asleep fast and stay asleep all night since taking them so the benefits are awesome. Especially for anyone who struggles to stay asleep due to generalized anxiety. The aroma is subtle, as well as the flavor so its taste is not overwhelming, as other supplements can be. Decent size capsules, easy to swallow. Quality product. Will definitely purchase again!

Folks, i finally found something that helps me to fall asleep faster. Before taking it, i  couldn't sleep well, and waking up every sec was so frustrating.  But, since i started taking dreamite i feel more refreshed and happier. The size is easy to swallow, and the ingredients in it is great.

There veggie capsules aren’t too hard to swallow. They have a typical taste you would get from a capsule. The ingredients are great for those who are vegetarian. The size of the bottle is well worth the price. I love the modern packaging and purple color. The benefit of a great sleep is wonderful.

As a busy mother of four and entrepreneur, I've always struggled with sleep. This sleep aid has been a lifesaver. The high-quality formula includes key ingredients like magnesium, valerian root, chamomile, L-theanine, passionflower, lemon balm, hops, L-tryptophan, GABA, and melatonin. The clinical-grade dosage of each ingredient helps me stay asleep and wake up refreshed. The non-habit-forming herbal blend is a major benefit, and since they're in pill form, they’re perfect for my Invisalign routine. Plus, the small pill size makes them easy to take, and there's no unpleasant taste. Falling back asleep after waking up with the kids has never been easier!

I have tried all kinds of sleep support products. I honestly didn't have very high hopes for this. But, I am surprised how well this product works to help me settle down at night. I love that I don't wake up feeling groggy. I will be ordering more. Great product from a brand I trust.

This has so many great relaxing/sleep ingredients! Besides a good dose of Melatonin it has many  quality supporting ingredients like lemon balm, valerian root and magnesium! All at great levels- with just two pills this is a great value! Another winner product that Im super pleased with from Nutrachamp.

review_title: The product is vegan, non-GMO, and lab-tested.
review_text:
I have been taking this supplement for several days. The package contains 60 vegetarian capsules that are easy to swallow and are enough for a month’s use, as the label suggests taking two every evening 30 minutes before going to bed. The main ingredients of DreamRite include extracts of valerian root, chamomile, passionflower, lemon balm, and hops; amino acids such as GABA, L-Theanine, and Tryptophan; Magnesium (in the form of chelated bisglycinate); and a generous amount of the sleep hormone melatonin. The formula is designed to help fall asleep faster, sleep more deeply, and wake up feeling more rested, but I definitely need more time to express my judgment on this because results always vary from person to person.

So far, I have not experienced any negative side effects. The capsules are not chewable, so they leave no aftertaste. The product is vegan, non-GMO, and lab-tested.

Wow! These are great! The dosage is perfect! The benefits are great! I have sleep better than I have in a long while. There is no after taste. I was really struggling with sleeping thru the night. But I take one about an hour before I want to be asleep and if I am not asleep I take one more and within 15 mins I am out! Great refreshing sleep! Most night one works just fine!

These sleep supplements help us to get the sleep we need. The quality of Nutrachamp is great for all products we have purchased. They use quality ingredients to help us sleep.

NutraChamps DreamRite Review

Quality: NutraChamps DreamRite capsules are meticulously crafted to meet high standards. They prioritize quality ingredients and effective results.

Ingredients: These veggie capsules blend natural compounds, including melatonin, chamomile, and passion flower. Melatonin, a hormone, plays a crucial role in regulating sleep cycles13. Chamomile and passion flowers contribute to relaxation and sedation.

Age: Suitable for adults of all ages who struggle with sleep quality or need occasional support for restful nights.

Superfood: While not a superfood per se, melatonin is a powerful natural supplement for improving sleep duration and quality. It helps rectify disrupted sleep patterns and promotes overall well-being.

Package: DreamRite comes in a convenient bottle with 60 easy-to-swallow veggie capsules. The packaging ensures freshness and ease of use.

Benefits:

• Enhanced Sleep: DreamRite helps you fall asleep faster and enjoy a deeper, more restful sleep.

• Stress Reduction: Chamomile and passion flowers contribute to relaxation, reducing stress and anxiety.

• Natural Solution: Melatonin, a natural hormone, provides a safe and effective way to improve sleep without dependency.

Diet: Vegan-friendly and free from synthetic additives, DreamRite aligns with various dietary preferences.

Mixing: No mixing is required; simply swallow the capsules with water before bedtime.

Antioxidant: While not a primary antioxidant source, the calming effects of chamomile and passion flowers indirectly support overall health.

Health Improvement: Regular use may lead to improved sleep patterns, better mood, and overall wellness.

Taste: Since these are capsules, there’s no taste involved. They’re easy to swallow and won’t leave any after taste.

In summary, NutraChamps DreamRite offers a natural, non-habit-forming solution for better sleep quality. If you’re seeking a reliable sleep aid, give these veggie capsules a try. Sweet dreams await!

I've been using NutraChamps Dreamrite Capsules, and I must say, the experience has been transformative for my sleep routine. After struggling with restless nights and frequent awakenings, this has exceeded my expectations. The capsules are truly easy to swallow, which is a huge plus for someone like me who typically struggles with larger pills. Within just a few days of taking Dreamrite, I noticed a significant improvement in my ability to fall asleep faster and stay asleep throughout the night. The natural ingredients and absence of grogginess in the morning have made this supplement a staple in my nightly routine.

Moreover, what sets Dreamrite apart is its gentle yet effective approach to promoting restful sleep. Unlike other sleep aids that can leave you feeling drowsy the next day, Dreamrite ensures I wake up refreshed and ready to tackle the day. The blend of calming herbs and melatonin works harmoniously to relax my mind and body, allowing for a deeper and more restorative sleep. I also appreciate that NutraChamps prioritizes quality with their veggie capsules, making it a great choice for those seeking a plant-based option. Overall, Dreamrite has made a significant difference in my sleep quality, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to improve their sleep health naturally.






I've been struggling to fall asleep lately, tossing and turning for what feels like hours. I decided to try a natural sleep aid and came across NutraChamps Dreamrite. What drew me in was the "easy-to-swallow" veggie capsules -  regular capsules can feel like swallowing boulders sometimes!

Dreamrite is definitely easy on the stomach. The capsules are small and smooth, going down with no problem.  It takes about 20-30 minutes to kick in, and then I slowly feel myself getting relaxed and drowsy.

I wouldn't say it knocks me out cold, but it helps me unwind and drift off to sleep much easier.  Mornings are better too - no grogginess like I can get with some sleep aids.

Overall, I'm really happy with Dreamrite. It's a gentle way to nudge me towards a good night's sleep, and the easy-to-swallow capsules are a big plus.
